data.title: Awesome food with great service
data.text: I had the fish tacos and sweet potato fries. Best food I've had this trip. And the servers were helpful. A great experience.

data.title: Awesomeness
data.text: We love breweries and my husband works for the railroad so before we arrived I knew we wanted to eat here. Delicious food--large portions. Great service and great beer. We got a flight and our server was sweet enough to get us a sample of another. We bought a growler to enjoy at the hotel for later. Texas red and the porter were our favorites.

data.title: Surf and Brew
data.text: This is always a restaurant destination whenever we go to Corpus because of all the great local beer and great seafood selections.

data.title: House brewed beer and great seafood
data.text: My wife and I go there often and we have not ever been disappointed. The food is fresh and very good and the service is very good!

data.title: Late night dinner
data.text: This was one of very few places open late after an event at American Bank Center. We enjoyed the food and the service!! Enjoyed the fried shrimp and the broccoli slaw was awesome!! We would recommend this place to family and friends 😊

data.title: One happy clam!
data.text:
I was told that this was similar to a restaurant we frequented much of my childhood but didn't require the hour drive it took to get there.  All I wanted was crab cakes & I was assured they had them.

The table ordered both the family style grilled & blackened shrimp while I ordered the grilled crab cakes with creamy Pontchartrain sauce.  For a moment, I regretted my decision because the shrimp were oh so delicious! Great jumbo size & great seasoning...so much that it didn't need any additional dipping sauce.  And there was plenty to go around.

The crab cakes, however, were worth going against the grain.  It was two patties that tasted like crab meat, instead of that "hint of crab" mixed in with fillers & then breaded & baked.  The Pontchartrain sauce wasn't too spicy & when mixed with the rice, combined for a nice, interesting taste.

I wasn't thrilled with the hobo fries, but the onion rings were decent.  Sliced, dipped in a batter mix & deep fried, the seafood sauce that came with them had a little bit of a kick to it but not enough to clear the sinuses.  Our wait staff Cruz was very much on top of things & did a nice job when we asked for extra items. 

I would come back here & try some other dishes, but definitely get the crab cakes to go!

data.title: A must try
data.text: When you first come in you are greeted the resturant is clean and spacious the food is delicious the drinks are great and the serious is awesome I would definitely come back

data.title: Great Ambiance and Delicious Food!
data.text: We had lunch at this restaurant during a weekend trip to Corpus Christi, we loved the layout of the building, decor and theme was very relaxing, plenty of light, very open but inviting at the same time, we were six in my party with kids, we ordered the appetizers the stuffed mushrooms, quesadillas and seafood gumbo, they all were delicious and well made, then we ordered the fish fried by the pound platter and the shrimp platter, they were so nice to accommodate my request to do half of the fish platter grilled for my little girl, I thought that was very nice, not many places modify their menu to please the customers! We also ordered the salmon plate and everything including the fries were cooked to perfection, I highly recommend the broccoli cole slaw, its was sweet and yummy and the sweet potato fries are the best!  This is definitely going to be the place to go next time we visit Corpus Christi!

data.title: Excellent Fish
data.text: Fish is fresh and the sweet potatoes fries are great! Don't forget the salad. That is great too! It is a big place so there is plenty of room for a big group.

data.title: Casual Seafood
data.text: Eaten here twice in 3 months.  The last time we had a pound of shrimp family style for my wife and I.  Good, but really not enough sides for two people.  I'd recommend getting the individual dinners instead.  Good craft beer selection, some brewed on site.  Interesting shrimp sauce with a kick.  Fairly good shrimp.  The fries I had back in May 2016 were outstanding.

data.title: Great food
data.text: We had lunch here yesterday and the food was very good.  The only bad thing was this is a commercial building with concrete floor and the noise is terrible.  The food was hot, fresh and cook just right.  Fried shrimp was great.

data.title: Nothing special, but okay
data.text:
I'm not a seafood eater but reviews urged decision to eat here.  Onion rings okay-individual thin slices that are battered, fried. Full order is a nice  serving but just a tad too greasy and they're not crispy, firm. Tartar sauce mayo base, hint of heat. Good flavor. Grilled chicken not overcooked, but lacked flavor, rice had strong thyme flavor. Brocolli slaw crispy, fresh tasting. The slaw was best part of my plate, but i love brocolli. 

Party had Crawfish etouuffe-balanced flavor, rue dark color, nice aroma. Came with rice on top, rice was fluffy. Fried catfish crispy, firm..but needed tartar sauce to add to flavor. Sweet potato fries cut very thin so they were limp-most of our party did not eat them. 

Overall the food was okay. Inside temp was in between cool/warm. The food was not bad, but i dont think this establishment is for me.

data.title: Very good service and Very Good seafood.
data.text: The coconut shrimp were perfect. We had dinner with friends on Wednesday night and lunch the next day with another friend. The grilled shrimp tostados were really great. Our friend liked it so much she took the nuns from Violet there for dinner on Friday night.

data.title: Fish tacos!
data.text: The blackened fish tacos are delicious with their homemade tartar sauce but they only serve it for lunch. Be sure and get the avocado salad as well as bit pricey and salty but good... and of course their shrimp is delicious bring an empty stomach and A full wallet

data.title: Friends of the hostess were seated first.
data.text:
Upon arrival, our party of 6, were told that it would be 15 minutes to be seated, however, we waited longer than 45 minutes. A group of 6 came in behind us, but since they were friends of the hostess, (they hugged her) they were seated before us in the Hofbrau bar area, which was not offered to us. 
Our group's food was good, except for the cold hobo fries. Our waiter was very busy, but attentive to us.

data.title: Fast service, good food
data.text: A group of 8 of us ate here on a Friday night but we didn't wait long for a table. They were super friendly and fast. There were several big groups (it was right after a graduation at the American Bank Center and several other families went there to eat) but we didn't wait long for anything. I had fried catfish with fresh green beans (not from a can!) and fries. All really good. Not sure of the cost since someone else paid :)

data.title: ALWAYS A PLEASURE
data.text: We visit Corpus Christi a few times a year for special occasions and always stop at RR Seafood Station.  The grilled drum fresh from the gulf is always excellent.  I prefer mild instead of fishy taste and this is so fresh that the taste is wonderful.  The atmosphere is a neat big old building but a little noisy.

data.title: Meh
data.text:
Overall:  
Just kind of average food.....
Exceptionally Cold Beer  
Not Terrible/ comforting in some ways- just kind of meh...

data.title: Craft brew and food too
data.text: Family style portions. Fried oysters or shrimp are delicious. Gotta get onion rings and avacado salad!! If you want healthy ask for grilled fish or shrimp. Great place to dine. They give samples of their craft beer,..:)

data.title: Decided to try the most local fresh fish--drum--it was excellent!
data.text: We had grilled drum and Cajun style drum. May be the best fish I've ever had and I've had a lot. Their home made key lime pie with probably valley limes was also best I've ever had including those in Key West! Their home recipe tartar sauce on the fish was excellent, too! Great food for these fresh fish lovers. Reasonable for lunch.
